    • Content

      /**
 This file calculates the Quantity Effect, subsidy effect, demand slope, and EPM
 Needs to be run after a regression with variables in the proper order:
	[InfoTreatment PriceTreatment InfoXPriceTreatment]

@author Allcott and Taubinsky
*/

/* GetEPM.do */


	matrix define b = e(b)
	matrix define b = b[1..1,1..3]
	matrix define V = e(V)
	matrix define V = V[1..3,1..3]

	** Get Quantity Effect
	matrix define GradQuantityEffect = [1,0,0.5]
	matrix QuantityEffect = GradQuantityEffect*b'
	local QuantityEffect = QuantityEffect[1,1]
	
	matrix QuantityEffectse = GradQuantityEffect*V*GradQuantityEffect'
	local QuantityEffectse = QuantityEffectse[1,1]^0.5
	
	
	** Get Subsidy Effect
	matrix define GradSubsidyEffect = [0,1,1]
	matrix SubsidyEffect = GradSubsidyEffect*b'
	local SubsidyEffect = SubsidyEffect[1,1]
	
	matrix SubsidyEffectse = GradSubsidyEffect*V*GradSubsidyEffect'
	local SubsidyEffectse = SubsidyEffectse[1,1]^0.5
	
	** Demand Slope and SE
	local DemandSlope = `SubsidyEffect'/`subsidy'
	local DemandSlopese = `SubsidyEffectse'/`subsidy'
	
	** Get EPM
	local EPM = `QuantityEffect'/(`SubsidyEffect'/`subsidy')

	* Define gradient matrix for EPM
		* Order: [Quantity Subsidy]
	matrix define GradEPM = (`subsidy'/`SubsidyEffect' , -`subsidy'*`QuantityEffect'/(`SubsidyEffect'^2) , ///
							0.5*`subsidy'/`SubsidyEffect' - `subsidy'*`QuantityEffect'/(`SubsidyEffect'^2)	)

	matrix EPMse = GradEPM * V * GradEPM'
	local EPMse = EPMse[1,1]^0.5

	
	/* Display results */
	** Quantity effect and SE
	display `QuantityEffect'
	display `QuantityEffectse'
	
	** Subsidy effect and SE
	display `SubsidyEffect'
	display `SubsidyEffectse'
	
	** Demand slope and SE
	display `DemandSlope'
	display `DemandSlopese'
	
	** EPM and SE
	display `EPM'
	display `EPMse'

      • Tokens

        GetEPM   GetEPM do
